description:
The environment in El Salvador course is about know and learn how the pollution affects the environment. Through this course you will learn how to care the place where you live. You will know some natural disasters that have affected El Salvador.

  • The keywords that you need to know in this curse are: Pollution, disasters, green, house effect, health matters, environment, recycling.
  • The materials are included in this course is: Curriculum, Videos, quizes.

The course is divided into five sections, each section students will learn about different topics that relate to each other.

This course helps students to become aware of our environment and polluted and neglected that humans have, for the sake of doing things that affect our environment.At the end of this course, students know how to care for the environment, and will be encouraged to do things properly to look after the place where they live, their cities, their countries.
title: The Environment in El Salvador.
instructors: Jhosseline Nathalia Ortez, Instructor Yesica Amaya, Zuleyma Elizabeth Martinez Perla, Leidy Gloribel Pérez Funes, Jeany Argueta
